Emerging growth company &#9744; If an emerging growth company, indicate by check mark if the registrant has elected not to use the extended transition period for complying with any new or revised financial accounting standards provided pursuant to Section 13(a) of the Exchange Act. &#9744; &#160; Table of Contents TABLE OF CONTENTS &#160; ITEM&#160;5.02.&#160;&#160;DEPARTURE OF DIRECTORS OR CERTAIN OFFICERS; ELECTION OF DIRECTORS; APPOINTMENT OF CERTAIN OFFICERS; COMPENSATORY ARRANGEMENTS OF CERTAIN OFFICERS. 3 &#160; &#160; ITEM&#160;9.01.&#160;&#160;FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND EXHIBITS. 3 &#160; &#160; SIGNATURES 4 Table of Contents ITEM&#160;5.02.&#160;&#160;DEPARTURE OF DIRECTORS OR CERTAIN OFFICERS; ELECTION OF DIRECTORS; APPOINTMENT OF CERTAIN OFFICERS; COMPENSATORY ARRANGEMENTS OF CERTAIN OFFICERS. On July 31, 2019, the Leadership Development and Compensation Committee of the Board of Amazon.com, Inc. (the &#8220;Company&#8221;) approved a leave of absence for Jeffrey M. Blackburn, Senior Vice President, Business Development, for one year beginning in the first quarter of 2020, suspending forfeiture of Mr. Blackburn&#8217;s restricted stock unit awards under the Company&#8217;s 1997 Stock Incentive Plan for the duration of his leave of absence. ITEM&#160;9.01.&#160;&#160;FINANCIAL&#160;STATEMENTS AND EXHIBITS.
